EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PCF/Data Workshop Brazil_Q215.Confirm - Rio de Janeiro
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Roadshow Rio de Janeiro
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/riodejaneiro> in Rio de Janeiro. Please find the event details below:
Date: May 19, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:00AM / Data Keynote begins @ 9:15AM / Data Session begins @ 10:30AM / Cloud Keynote begins @ 1:00PM / Cloud Session #1 begins @ 2:00 PM / Cloud Session #2 begins @ 3:15 PM Location: Windsor Atlântica, Av. Atlântica, 1020, Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil
{{my.Save the Date - Rio de Janeiro:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:info@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
